meta.job_title: Assistant Director of Alumni Relations and Annual Giving

duties_responsibilities.duty: Meeting annual goals for fundraising and alumni engagement.
Managing related events, fundraising programs, and stewardship initiatives.
Designing and implementing strategies to increase annual fund participation.
Building and strengthening existing donor relationships among alumni and friends of the organization.
Responsible for all functions pertaining to alumni relations.
Being the primary liaison with the organization's Alumni Board of Governors.
